Source code for pytomography

import torch

[docs]device = torch.device("cpu")


[docs]dtype = torch.float32


[docs]delta = 1e-11



[docs]def set_dtype(dt):
    global dtype
    global delta
    dtype = dt
    torch.set_default_dtype(dt)
    if dt==torch.float16:
        delta = 1e-5
    elif dt==torch.float32:
        delta = 1e-11

    

[docs]def set_device(d):
    global device
    device = d
